page.title: 16RECREATION
page.content:
IN THE AREA OF{BRUNTON,}FOR RECREATIONAL PURPOSES: SOME PEOPLE {CYCLE,WALK,SWIM,PLAY SQUASH,GO {CAMPING,TRAIN HORSES,KEEP BEES,DO {COOKING,GARDEN,WATCH TV,MAKE {CROOKS,READ,DO ARTS AND CRAFTS,PLAY {THE PIANO,KEEP PETS}OR{LOOK AFTER {CHILDREN.}THEY DO THESE THINGS BECAUSE IT FITS IN WITH THEIR WORK OR BECAUSE IT KEEPS THEM FIT. OTHER PEOPLE DO {FLORAL ART}OR MAKE THINGS LIKE{KNITTED OR{CROCHETED}ARTICLES OR{WOODWORK. SOME PEOPLE GO TO THE{CINEMA}AND SOME PEOPLE THINK OF{WORK}AS A PASTIME WHILE OTHERS WATCH{TV.
THE{PARK}IN{BRUNTON VILLAGE}WAS GIFTED BY A BRUNTON FAMILY. THE VILLAGE AND THE{COUNTY COUNCIL}HELPED PAY FOR THE {SWINGS.}THE{REGIONAL COUNCIL}LOOKS AFTER THE{PARK.
